item.title: Complete WordPress Theme Development
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
WordPress theme development is the process of creating custom designs and layouts for websites built on the WordPress platform. A WordPress theme is a collection of files that work together to define the visual presentation and functionality of a website. These files include PHP scripts, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and sometimes images and other assets. By developing a theme, you can control how content is displayed on the front end, such as pages, posts, archives, and more.

The process involves understanding the WordPress theme hierarchy, which dictates how WordPress selects files to render different parts of the website. For instance, you can create templates for specific pages, categories, or posts to customize their appearance. Developers typically start with a basic template structure, which includes essential files like style.css, functions.php, and index.php. These files are used to define styles, register scripts, and create the foundational layout of the theme.

A key aspect of WordPress theme development is ensuring compatibility with the platform’s features, such as widgets, menus, and the block editor (Gutenberg). Additionally, themes can be designed to support custom post types, taxonomies, and advanced functionalities using the WordPress APIs. Developers also consider responsive design principles to ensure themes perform well on devices of all sizes.

To make themes accessible to others, developers adhere to coding standards, include proper documentation, and validate their work. Themes can be packaged for personal use, client projects, or distribution through the WordPress Theme Directory or third-party marketplaces.

Ultimately, WordPress theme development is about creating visually appealing, functional, and user-friendly experiences that align with a site’s goals and brand identity.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Understanding WordPress Architecture Setting Up a Development Environment The Basics of Theme Structure Writing Custom Code Using WordPress APIs Responsive and Accessible Design Advanced Customizations Website SEO Customizations Performance Optimization Theme Deployment and Distribution
Web Developers and Designers Freelancers and Entrepreneurs WordPress Users and Enthusiasts Students and Beginners Agencies and Teams Software Developers

The course is well organized and gives very helpful information and in-depth explanations I recommend you to be at least familiar with CSS in order to properly understand and take advantage of this course.

item.title: Complete Figma UI UX Design Essentials
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
The Complete Figma UI/UX Design Essentials course is your gateway to mastering user interface and user experience design using one of the most versatile and widely used tools in the industry—Figma. This course is perfect for beginners and designed to guide you step-by-step through the fundamentals of UI/UX design, ensuring you develop the skills and confidence to create stunning, user-centric designs.

Starting with an introduction to Figma, you will explore its intuitive interface and powerful features, making it easier than ever to turn your creative ideas into reality. You’ll learn how to set up projects, navigate the design environment, and collaborate effectively with others, all within Figma’s cloud-based platform.

The course delves into the core principles of design, covering key concepts such as typography, color theory, layout composition, and visual hierarchy. These foundations will empower you to create aesthetically pleasing and functional designs that cater to user needs. You’ll progress from crafting basic wireframes that outline functionality to designing fully interactive prototypes that simulate real-world user experiences.

As you advance, you’ll uncover Figma’s advanced features, such as components, auto-layout, and plugins, which streamline your workflow and enable you to create responsive designs effortlessly. Throughout the course, you’ll work on practical, real-world projects, including mobile app interfaces, web layouts, and user dashboards. These projects will help you build a professional portfolio that showcases your design capabilities.

Beyond the technical aspects, the course also emphasizes effective collaboration and design handoff. You’ll learn how to share your work with stakeholders, gather feedback, and provide developers with clear and actionable designs to bring your vision to life.

Whether you’re an aspiring UI/UX designer, a developer aiming to enhance your understanding of design, or an entrepreneur looking to create user-friendly products, this course is tailored to meet your needs. By the end, you’ll not only be proficient in Figma but also equipped with the essential knowledge and skills to succeed in the world of UI/UX design. Join the course today and start creating impactful, user-focused designs!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: How to begin working as a UX Designer. How to make fully interactive prototypes. You will be able to add UX designer to your CV. What the client expects of you as a UX designer. Work with fonts & colors. Export production ready assets. All the techniques used by UX professionals How to work with a UX personas. Build a UX project from beginning to end. How to create simple wireframes.

item.title: Build Responsive Real-World Websites with HTML and CSS
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
Build Responsive Real-World Websites with HTML and CSS

Unlock the skills to create stunning, modern websites that look great on any device! This comprehensive course is designed for beginners and intermediate learners who want to master the fundamentals of HTML and CSS, as well as responsive web design techniques.

You'll learn how to structure and style websites effectively, apply real-world best practices, and implement advanced features like flexbox, grid layouts, animations, and media queries. By the end of the course, you’ll have built fully responsive, professional-quality websites that adapt seamlessly to desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

item.title: React Tutorial Beginners For Skills Building Carrera
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
React Tutorial for Beginners – Build Your Skills with Carrera

Take the first step into the exciting world of React development with this beginner-friendly course! Designed for aspiring web developers, this course offers a practical introduction to React, one of the most popular JavaScript libraries for building modern, dynamic user interfaces.

With step-by-step guidance, real-world examples, and hands-on projects, this course is perfect for beginners who want to build a solid foundation in React. By the end, you'll have the confidence to create your own React applications and advance your journey in web development.

No prior experience in React is required, but basic knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS will be helpful. Start building your skills today with Carrera!

item.title: Mastering Adobe Illustrator: Essential Skills for Graphic Design
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
Mastering Adobe Illustrator: Essential Skills for Graphic Design is a comprehensive course designed to help beginners and intermediate users unlock their creative potential and master the powerful features of Adobe Illustrator. This course offers hands-on training in the core tools and techniques needed to create stunning vector graphics, logos, illustrations, and more.

You'll learn how to navigate Illustrator's interface, use essential tools like the Pen and Shape Builder, work with color, gradients, and typography, and apply effects to enhance your designs. With practical projects and step-by-step guidance, you'll build confidence in creating professional-quality designs for web, print, and beyond.

Whether you're an aspiring graphic designer, artist, or someone looking to enhance your creative skill set, this course provides the foundation you need to succeed in the world of design.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Fundamentals of Adobe Illustrator Essential Tools and Features Working with Color Typography and Text Design Advanced Techniques Illustration and Design Projects
Hours of on-demand video 90+ articles and texts Assignments Certificate of completion

item.title: Adobe Premiere Pro Masterclass: Video Editing in Premiere
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
Adobe Premiere Pro Masterclass: Video Editing in Premiere is an in-depth course designed to help you master the art of video editing using Adobe Premiere Pro, one of the most powerful and widely used video editing software. Whether you’re a beginner or an intermediate editor, this course will equip you with the skills and knowledge to create professional-quality videos for various purposes, from YouTube content to cinematic projects.

Through step-by-step lessons and practical projects, you’ll explore the entire video editing workflow—from importing and organizing footage to applying effects, transitions, and color grading. You’ll also learn advanced techniques like audio enhancement, motion graphics integration, and exporting videos in the best formats for different platforms.

This masterclass is perfect for aspiring video editors, content creators, and professionals who want to take their video editing skills to the next level. By the end of the course, you'll have the expertise to craft stunning videos that captivate audiences and tell compelling stories.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Introduction to Adobe Premiere Pro Basic Video Editing Techniques Advanced Editing and Effects Audio Editing and Enhancement Color Correction and Grading Motion Graphics and Visual Effects Exporting and Sharing Your Project Advanced Tips and Workflow Optimization

item.title: Mastering Webflow: Build Stunning Websites Without Code
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
Mastering Webflow: Build Stunning Websites Without Code is a comprehensive course designed for those who want to create professional, fully responsive websites without writing a single line of code. Whether you're a designer, entrepreneur, or creative looking to build a personal portfolio or business website, this course will teach you how to leverage Webflow’s powerful visual interface to bring your ideas to life.

In this hands-on course, you'll learn how to design, build, and launch websites using Webflow's drag-and-drop tools. From creating layouts and styling elements to integrating animations and interactions, you’ll gain the skills needed to produce visually stunning and functional websites. You'll also dive into best practices for responsive design, SEO optimization, and website publishing, ensuring your projects look great on any device and reach the right audience.

By the end of this course, you’ll have the expertise to create dynamic websites with ease, and you’ll be confident in using Webflow to bring your creative vision to life—no coding required!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Create responsive websites using Webflow. Basic layout techniques. Build your own portfolio website. How to optimise your website for SEO. Simple animations. Flex, columns and divs. Create and style forms within your website. Deploy & Maintenance

item.title: Engaging Students in Real-World Problems Finding
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
Event Overview

In today's rapidly evolving educational landscape, traditional teaching methods are being reimagined to meet the needs of a new generation of learners. The "Innovative Teaching Strategies for the 21st Century Classroom" event is designed to empower educators with cutting-edge tools, techniques, and insights that are transforming how we approach teaching and learning. This event will explore a wide range of innovative strategies, from integrating technology and fostering collaboration to promoting critical thinking and creativity in the classroom. Participants will engage with thought leaders and experienced educators who are at the forefront of educational innovation.

Through interactive workshops, panel discussions, and hands-on sessions, attendees will gain practical knowledge and actionable ideas to enhance student engagement, personalize learning experiences, and prepare students for the challenges of the modern world. Whether you're a seasoned educator or new to the profession, this event offers valuable opportunities to rethink your approach and inspire your students in ways that are both impactful and relevant in the 21st century.

During this event, we’ll cover

  • Introduction to WordPress Themes
  • Setting Up the Development Environment
  • Theme Design and Styling
  • Dynamic Content with PHP and WordPress Functions
  • Theme Options and Customization
  • WordPress Theme Security

Define Clear Objectives

WordPress theme customization refers to the process of modifying an existing WordPress theme to better suit the needs and preferences of a website owner. It allows you to tweak the visual design, functionality, and layout of a theme without needing to build one from scratch. Whether you're aiming to adjust colors, fonts, or layouts or add custom features, theme customization empowers you to create a personalized and unique user experience.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{i:0;a:6:{s:18:"etn_schedule_topic";s:27:"WordPress Theme Development";s:22:"etn_shedule_start_time";s:8:"09:00 AM";s:20:"etn_shedule_end_time";s:8:"10:30 AM";s:16:"etn_shedule_room";s:8:"New York";s:21:"etn_shedule_objective";s:348:"WordPress is super easy to use. In fact, anyone without any technical knowledge, can set up and start using WordPress in no time. However, WordPress has a vast ecosystem. I, for one, would categorize WordPress development being carried out in two different domains. I’ll first list those domains below and then I will discuss each one separately.";s:8:"speakers";a:1:{i:0;i:3;}}}

a:1:{i:0;a:6:{s:18:"etn_schedule_topic";s:27:"Webflow Website Development";s:22:"etn_shedule_start_time";s:8:"11:00 AM";s:20:"etn_shedule_end_time";s:8:"12:00 PM";s:16:"etn_shedule_room";s:10:"California";s:21:"etn_shedule_objective";s:274:"Webflow helps teams collaborate and develop the website. It reduces development time as teams develop and design the website simultaneously. Similarly, content teams can edit while the design continues. Webflow also makes it easy for project managers to oversee the process.";s:8:"speakers";a:1:{i:0;i:3;}}}

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

Michael Thomas Director, Plan4Demand

Matthew Martin Director, Hobby Lobby

Julian Walker Director, 7Eleven

Interactive Learning Experience

Henry Baker Director, Puzzle Huddle

item.title: Unlearn
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
Let Go of Past Success to Achieve Extraordinary Results" by Barry O'Reilly is a thought-provoking book that challenges readers to rethink their approach to personal and professional growth. The central premise of the book is that clinging to past successes and outdated beliefs can hinder progress and limit innovation. O'Reilly introduces the concept of unlearning, a process of letting go of habits, mindsets, and behaviors that no longer serve us, and replacing them with new ones that align with current realities and future aspirations. Through engaging stories, real-world examples, and practical exercises, the book guides readers on how to adapt to change, embrace continuous learning, and achieve breakthrough results in a rapidly evolving world. Written for leaders, entrepreneurs, and anyone seeking meaningful growth, "Unlearn" inspires a mindset shift that is essential for thriving in today’s dynamic environment.

item.excerpt:encoded: The book delves into the idea that true growth and innovation require not just learning new skills or strategies but actively unlearning what no longer works. By sharing actionable insights, real-life examples, and a clear framework for embracing change, O'Reilly equips readers with the tools to navigate uncertainty, adapt to new challenges, and unlock their potential. This book serves as a practical guide for anyone looking to overcome complacency, foster adaptability, and achieve extraordinary outcomes in an ever-changing world.

item.title: Fail More
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
"Fail More: Embrace, Learn, and Adapt to Failure as a Way to Success" by Bill Wooditch is a transformative book that redefines the role of failure in personal and professional growth. Wooditch argues that failure is not something to be feared or avoided but rather a critical element of achieving meaningful success. Drawing on his own experiences and insights, he explains how embracing failure can lead to greater resilience, innovation, and self-discovery.
The book provides a practical framework for understanding and navigating failure, offering readers tools to face challenges with courage, learn valuable lessons from setbacks, and adapt their strategies for better results. With an encouraging tone and relatable examples, Wooditch inspires readers to step out of their comfort zones, take calculated risks, and view failure as a stepping stone to achieving their goals. "Fail More" serves as a powerful reminder that the road to success is often paved with lessons learned from falling short and getting back up stronger than before.
item.excerpt:encoded: "Fail More: Embrace, Learn, and Adapt to Failure as a Way to Success" by Bill Wooditch is an inspiring book that redefines the concept of failure as an essential step toward achieving success. It emphasizes the importance of facing challenges head-on, learning from setbacks, and using those lessons to grow personally and professionally. With actionable advice and practical strategies, Wooditch encourages readers to overcome the fear of failure, take calculated risks, and view missteps as valuable opportunities for progress. This book is a motivational guide for anyone seeking to build resilience and unlock their full potential.

item.title: Happy and Strong
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
"Happy & Strong: Create Your Dream Life While Enjoying the Journey" by Jaime Villalovos is a motivational and empowering book that blends practical advice with heartfelt inspiration to help readers design a life they love. Jaime, a successful entrepreneur and leader, shares her personal experiences and insights, guiding readers on how to achieve their dreams without sacrificing their happiness, health, or relationships.
The book emphasizes the importance of living a balanced and purpose-driven life while striving for success. Jaime encourages readers to align their goals with their values, cultivate resilience, and find joy in the process rather than just focusing on the destination. Through relatable stories, actionable steps, and an uplifting tone, she provides the tools needed to create meaningful change in both personal and professional life. "Happy & Strong" is a call to action for those who want to excel in their careers, nurture their well-being, and enjoy the journey every step of the way.
item.excerpt:encoded:
"Happy & Strong: Create Your Dream Life While Enjoying the Journey" by Jaime Villalovos is an inspiring and practical guide to achieving both professional success and personal fulfillment. The book focuses on balancing ambition and well-being, offering readers actionable strategies to build their dream lives without sacrificing happiness, health, or relationships along the way.
Jaime shares her personal journey from humble beginnings to becoming a successful entrepreneur, weaving in valuable lessons about goal-setting, resilience, and self-care. With relatable stories and insightful advice, she empowers readers to define what success means to them, prioritize their well-being, and enjoy the process of pursuing their dreams. This book is perfect for anyone looking to achieve their goals while staying grounded and living a joyful, purpose-driven life.

item.title: Work On Your Game
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
"Work On Your Game" is a book by Dre Baldwin, a former professional basketball player who transitioned into entrepreneurship, motivational speaking, and coaching. The book shares Baldwin's philosophy on achieving success, not just in sports but in any area of life. Baldwin draws from his own experiences, both as an athlete and a businessman, to provide readers with strategies for developing the mindset, discipline, and work ethic necessary to excel.
Throughout the book, Baldwin focuses on the importance of mental toughness, confidence, and self-discipline. He explains how these traits are essential for overcoming challenges, staying focused, and pushing through setbacks. Drawing parallels between basketball and real-life scenarios, Baldwin teaches readers how to embrace hard work, take initiative, and remain persistent in the face of adversity. The book goes beyond typical self-help advice, emphasizing the need to take ownership of one’s actions and make continuous efforts toward improvement. Baldwin stresses that success doesn't happen overnight but requires consistent practice, preparation, and execution. He motivates readers to develop the habits and attitudes that lead to excellence, no matter what their specific goals may be. In essence, "Work On Your Game" is a call to action for anyone looking to elevate their performance, whether in their career, personal life, or other pursuits. It challenges readers to push beyond their limits and focus on developing the traits that will help them achieve long-term success.
item.excerpt:encoded:
"Work On Your Game" is a book by Dre Baldwin, a former professional basketball player who transitioned into entrepreneurship, motivational speaking, and coaching. The book shares Baldwin's philosophy on achieving success, not just in sports but in any area of life. Baldwin draws from his own experiences, both as an athlete and a businessman, to provide readers with strategies for developing the mindset, discipline, and work ethic necessary to excel.
Throughout the book, Baldwin focuses on the importance of mental toughness, confidence, and self-discipline. He explains how these traits are essential for overcoming challenges, staying focused, and pushing through setbacks. Drawing parallels between basketball and real-life scenarios, Baldwin teaches readers how to embrace hard work, take initiative, and remain persistent in the face of adversity.

item.title: Own Your Authority
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
"Own Your Authority" by Jonathan J. H. Smith is a compelling guide that empowers individuals to confidently claim their space as leaders and experts in their fields. The book addresses the challenges many face in asserting their authority, whether due to self-doubt, external pressures, or fear of failure. Smith emphasizes that authority is not something given by others, but something that must be developed and claimed through self-belief, action, and consistent effort.
The central theme of the book revolves around the idea of taking ownership of one’s abilities and knowledge. Smith argues that true authority comes from within—when a person is clear about their strengths, values, and expertise, they can communicate more effectively, make confident decisions, and lead with a sense of purpose. The book offers practical strategies for overcoming common barriers to authority, such as fear of judgment or imposter syndrome, and teaches readers how to project confidence in both personal and professional interactions.
Smith’s approach is holistic, integrating principles of self-awareness, emotional intelligence, and effective communication. He provides actionable steps to help individuals position themselves as credible leaders, whether they are leading teams, managing projects, or navigating career challenges. The book also discusses how to handle difficult situations, manage resistance, and create an environment where one's authority is respected and trusted.
Ultimately, "Own Your Authority" is about embracing the power within to make bold choices, take decisive actions, and step into leadership roles with confidence. Smith’s message is clear: by recognizing and owning your authority, you can transform the way you lead, influence, and create change in your life and career.
item.excerpt:encoded: "Own Your Authority" by Jonathan J. H. Smith is a guide for individuals looking to assert their confidence, leadership, and influence in both personal and professional settings. The book explores how to tap into one’s inherent strengths and cultivate a sense of self-assurance that enables you to lead with impact. Smith highlights the importance of owning your expertise, making decisions with conviction, and stepping into roles that demand leadership. The book provides strategies for overcoming self-doubt, navigating challenges, and communicating with authority. It is particularly valuable for professionals who want to establish themselves as confident leaders and influencers in their respective fields.

item.title: The Phoenix Encounter
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded: "The Phoenix Encounter" by Ian C. Woodward, Vijay Govindarajan, and Chris Trimble is a business fable that explores how companies can adapt and thrive in times of disruption. The book follows the story of a global corporation facing an impending crisis due to rapid changes in its industry. The central characters, a group of executives, must navigate their company through a transformative journey, ultimately learning how to reinvent their business model, embrace innovation, and respond effectively to external challenges. The authors highlight the importance of strategic thinking, leadership, and agility in overcoming obstacles and seizing new opportunities. Through the narrative, they offer practical insights into how organizations can manage transformation, develop a future-focused mindset, and achieve sustainable growth in an era of uncertainty. At its core, "The Phoenix Encounter" is about the process of reinvention. The book emphasizes that true success in the face of disruption requires bold leadership, collaborative efforts, and a willingness to let go of old ways of doing business. It serves as both a cautionary tale and a guide for leaders looking to navigate the complexities of a rapidly evolving business landscape.
item.excerpt:encoded:
"The Phoenix Encounter" by Ian C. Woodward, Vijay Govindarajan, and Chris Trimble is a business fable that explores how companies can adapt and thrive in times of disruption. The book follows the story of a global corporation facing an impending crisis due to rapid changes in its industry. The central characters, a group of executives, must navigate their company through a transformative journey, ultimately learning how to reinvent their business model, embrace innovation, and respond effectively to external challenges.
The authors highlight the importance of strategic thinking, leadership, and agility in overcoming obstacles and seizing new opportunities. Through the narrative, they offer practical insights into how organizations can manage transformation, develop a future-focused mindset, and achieve sustainable growth in an era of uncertainty.

item.title: The Creator Mindset
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded: "The Creator Mindset" by Nadia R. R. is a book that explores the power of creativity and how adopting a "creator mindset" can lead to success and fulfillment in both personal and professional life. The author delves into the ways in which individuals can shift their thinking from being passive consumers to active creators, unlocking their potential for innovation and problem-solving. The book emphasizes that creativity is not just reserved for artists or entrepreneurs but is a mindset that can be cultivated by anyone. Nadia provides strategies and practical tools to help readers break free from limiting beliefs, embrace their creative power, and build the confidence to take bold action. By shifting from a fixed mindset to a creator mindset, readers are encouraged to see challenges as opportunities for growth and view setbacks as part of the creative process. Overall, "The Creator Mindset" is a guide for anyone looking to enhance their creativity, develop a more innovative approach to life, and tap into their full potential. It offers insights on how to overcome obstacles, take risks, and approach life's challenges with a solution-oriented and creative mindset.
item.excerpt:encoded:
"The Creator Mindset" by Nadia R. R. is a book that explores the power of creativity and how adopting a "creator mindset" can lead to success and fulfillment in both personal and professional life. The author delves into the ways in which individuals can shift their thinking from being passive consumers to active creators, unlocking their potential for innovation and problem-solving.
The book emphasizes that creativity is not just reserved for artists or entrepreneurs but is a mindset that can be cultivated by anyone. Nadia provides strategies and practical tools to help readers break free from limiting beliefs, embrace their creative power, and build the confidence to take bold action. By shifting from a fixed mindset to a creator mindset, readers are encouraged to see challenges as opportunities for growth and view setbacks as part of the creative process.

item.title: The Untapped Force
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
"The Untapped Force" by Dan D. Auerbach explores the concept of unlocking and harnessing an often overlooked, yet powerful force within individuals—one that can drive personal transformation, success, and fulfillment. The book delves into the idea that many people unknowingly possess immense potential that remains dormant due to a lack of awareness, guidance, or the right mindset.
Auerbach presents practical tools and strategies for tapping into this "untapped force," whether it’s unlocking hidden strengths, shifting limiting beliefs, or overcoming the mental barriers that hold people back. The book emphasizes the importance of self-awareness, purpose, and intentional action in awakening this inner power. It also explores how this force can be used to create lasting change, not only in one’s personal life but also in professional endeavors. By the end of the book, readers are encouraged to take bold steps toward realizing their full potential, guided by a deeper understanding of how to access this powerful force that lies within. "The Untapped Force" offers inspiration and actionable insights for anyone seeking to break free from stagnation and achieve their highest goals.
item.excerpt:encoded:
"The Untapped Force" by Dan D. Auerbach explores the concept of unlocking and harnessing an often overlooked, yet powerful force within individuals—one that can drive personal transformation, success, and fulfillment. The book delves into the idea that many people unknowingly possess immense potential that remains dormant due to a lack of awareness, guidance, or the right mindset.
Auerbach presents practical tools and strategies for tapping into this "untapped force," whether it’s unlocking hidden strengths, shifting limiting beliefs, or overcoming the mental barriers that hold people back. The book emphasizes the importance of self-awareness, purpose, and intentional action in awakening this inner power.

item.title: Contact Page
item.dc:creator: edcare
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name class:form-control placeholder "Your Name"]
[email* your-email class:form-control placeholder "Your Email"]
[select* your-subject class:nice-select select-control form-control country "Select Subject" "Plan One" "Plan Two" "Plan Three"]
[textarea* your-message class:form-control placeholder "Message"]
1 [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [_site_admin_email] From: [your-name] [your-email] Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This is a notification that a contact form was submitted on your website ([_site_title] [_site_url]). Reply-To: [your-email] [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message. Reply-To: [_site_admin_email] Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. Please fill out this field. This field has a too long input. This field has a too short input. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The uploaded file is too large. There was an error uploading the file. Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field has a too early date. This field has a too late date. Please enter a number. This field has a too small number. This field has a too large number. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Please enter an email address. Please enter a URL. Please enter a telephone number.
